categories: Category:Unidentified clone troopers of the 501st Legion

nodes.text: A clone was part of the 501st Legion as an Advanced Recon Force Trooper and participated at the Battle of Umbara around 21 BBY.

After the initial assault on the planet Umbara, the clone troopers of the 501st Legion managed to push back the Umbaran militia and claim a ridge to the north. As they rested on the entrenched ridge, Umbaran insurgents regrouped themselves for an ambush on the clone encampment. The clones were caught off guard and many of them were killed, including this trooper, who was shot in the back while trying to start his All Terrain Recon Transport.
